body.message: The given 'format' parameter is invalid. Please choose between 'geojson'(only available for /groupBy/boundary and data extraction requests), 'json', or 'csv'.

metadata.description: Total area of items in square meters satisfying the filter2 parameter (= value2 output), as well as items selected by the filter parameter (= value output) and the quotient (= ratio output) of value2 to value.
